BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO HK_SUBAREA_MST(NUM_AREA_TYPE_ID, NUM_SUBAREA_ID, STR_SUBAREA_NAME, NUM_TOTAL_AREA, NUM_NO_OF_ROOM, NUM_NO_OF_TOILET, NUM_NO_OF_CORRIDOR, NUM_NO_OF_STAIRS, GSTR_REMARKS, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE HK_SUBAREA_MST SET STR_SUBAREA_NAME=?,NUM_TOTAL_AREA=?, NUM_NO_OF_ROOM=?, NUM_NO_OF_TOILET=?, NUM_NO_OF_CORRIDOR=?, NUM_NO_OF_STAIRS=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_AREA_TYPE_ID=? and NUM_SUBAREA_ID=? and gnum_hospital_code=?
UPDATE HK_SUBAREA_MST SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_AREA_TYPE_ID=? and NUM_SUBAREA_ID=? AND gnum_hospital_code=?
